00065                         $this->GalleryAccess = get_package( 'gallery::gallery_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );

00098             function                get_dependent_gallery_id( &$BlockSettings )
00099             {
00100                   try
00101                   {
00102                         $ObjectType = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'master_type' );
00103                         $ObjectId = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'master_id' );
00104                         
00105                         if( $this->Link->link_exists( $ObjectId , false , $ObjectType , 'gallery' ) )
00106                         {
00107                               $Link = $this->Link->get_links( $ObjectId , false , $ObjectType , 'gallery' );
00108                               
00109                               return( get_field( $Link[ 0 ] , 'object2_id' ) );
00110                         }
00111                         else
00112                         {
00113                               $id = $this->GalleryAccess->create( 
00114                                     array( 
00115                                           'title' => "gallery for $ObjectType|id=$ObjectId" , 
00116                                           'description' => "description for $ObjectType|id=$ObjectId" 
00117                                     )
00118                               );
00119                               $this->Link->create_link( $ObjectId , $id , $ObjectType , 'gallery' );
00120                               
00121                               return( $id );
00122                         }
00123                   }
00124                   catch( Exception $e )
00125                   {
00126                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00127                   }
00128             }

00152             function                get_gallery( &$BlockSettings )
00153             {
00154                   try
00155                   {
00156                         if( $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'master_id' , false ) === false )
00157                         {
00158                               $id = $BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' );
00159                         }
00160                         else
00161                         {
00162                               $id = $this->get_dependent_gallery_id( $BlockSettings );
00163                         }
00164                         
00165                         return( $this->GalleryAlgorithms->get_by_id( $id ) );
00166                   }
00167                   catch( Exception $e )
00168                   {
00169                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00170                   }
00171             }

00199             function                get_galery_template_for_client( $FilePath , $GalleryId )
00200             {
00201                   try
00202                   {
00203                         $GalleryTemplate = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $FilePath );
00204                         $GalleryTemplate = str_replace( '{gallery_id}' , $GalleryId , $GalleryTemplate );
00205                         $GalleryTemplate = str_replace( '{id}' , '[id]' , $GalleryTemplate );
00206                         $GalleryTemplate = str_replace( '{file_path}' , '[file_path]' , $GalleryTemplate );
00207                         $GalleryTemplate = str_replace( '{original_file_name}' , '[original_file_name]' , $GalleryTemplate );
00208                         $GalleryTemplate = str_replace( '{' , '[lfb]' , $GalleryTemplate );
00209                         $GalleryTemplate = str_replace( '}' , '[rfb]' , $GalleryTemplate );
00210                         
00211                         return( $GalleryTemplate );
00212                   }
00213                   catch( Exception $e )
00214                   {
00215                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00216                   }
00217             }

00245             function                compile_gallery( $Gallery , $Files )
00246             {
00247                   try
00248                   {
00249                         $Code = '';
00250                         $FilePath = dirname( __FILE__ ).'/res/templates/simple_file_list.tpl';
00251                         $GalleryId = get_field( $Gallery , 'id' );
00252                         
00253                         foreach( $Files as $i => $File )
00254                         {
00255                               $Code .= $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $FilePath );
00256                               $Code  = $this->String->print_record( $Code , $File );
00257                         }
00258                         $Code  = str_replace( '{gallery_id}' , $GalleryId , $Code );
00259                         
00260                         $Input  = "{file_input:file_types=images;upload_url=gallery_upload.html?gallery_id[eq]{gallery_id};";
00261                         $Input .= "upload_success_handler=ultimix_gallery_AfterImageUploadProcessor}";
00262                         $Input  = str_replace( '{gallery_id}' , $GalleryId , $Input );
00263                               
00264                         $GalleryTemplate = $this->get_galery_template_for_client( $FilePath , $GalleryId );
00265                         $GalleryTemplate = "<div class='gallery'><div class='gallery_items'>$Code</div>".
00266                                     "<div class='gallery_template' style='display: none;'>$GalleryTemplate</div>$Input</div>";
00267                         $GalleryTemplate = str_replace( '{gallery_id}' , $GalleryId , $GalleryTemplate );
00268 
00269                         return( $GalleryTemplate );
00270                   }
00271                   catch( Exception $e )
00272                   {
00273                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00274                   }
00275             }

00303             function                process_gallery( $ProcessingString , $Changed )
00304             {
00305                   try
00306                   {
00307                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'gallery' ) ; )
00308                         {
00309                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00310                               $Gallery = $this->get_gallery( $this->BlockSettings );
00311                               $Files = $this->GalleryAlgorithms->get_gallery_files( get_field( $Gallery , 'id' ) );
00312                   
00313                               $Code = $this->compile_gallery( $Gallery , $Files );
00314                               
00315                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{gallery:$MacroParameters}" , $Code , $ProcessingString );
00316                               $Changed = true;
00317                         }
00318                         
00319                         return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
00320                   }
00321                   catch( Exception $e )
00322                   {
00323                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00324                   }
00325             }
00326             
00357             function                process_string( $Options , $ProcessingString , &$Changed )
00358             {
00359                   try
00360                   {
00361                         list( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) = $this->process_gallery( $ProcessingString , $Changed );
00362                         
00363                         return( $ProcessingString );
00364                   }
00365                   catch( Exception $e )
00366                   {
00367                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00368                   }
00369             }
